mapper.select: select user_table.user_id , username, user_communication_info_table.user_communication_info_id, email, phone_number, address from user_table left join user_to_user_communication_info_table on user_table.user_id = user_to_user_communication_info_table.user_id left join user_communication_info_table on user_to_user_communication_info_table.user_communication_info_id = user_communication_info_table.user_communication_info_id where username = #{username}
